document_name: Spanish Strategy for Science, Technology and Innovation 2021-2027
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ESP/2020/ESP-2020-08-08-Spanish Strategy for Science, Technology and Innovation 2021-2027_d81f985045e53bc17ba1c19c7d3d1ba5.pdf
document_description: This document is the multi-year reference framework whose objectives are shared by all the Public Administrations with powers in the field of promoting scientific, technical and innovation research. One of the strategic sectors to emphasize on is fighting against climate change, decarboning the energy mix, cleanmobility and overall sustainability.
